body: Weird ass plot, but funny despite the cbt. Pretty sad this is the author's most famous work, out of 80, and it has only 1000 favorites, guess thats the result of only writing meme cbt comics.
Mark me down as  horny and scared

This shit is hilarious.  I can't take it too seriously.. its an amusing fetish although honestly since I've been shot in the nuts by a 16 yo girl at a paintball tourney- I can say it was no fun at all.  I puked for 2 hours, dry heaves, and my nuts turned all sorts of hideous colors for a few weeks as they healed.  I had shot her in the tits initially, and she was pissed so she 'got revenge' but then felt bad after I started convulsing on the ground.  I freaking couldnt fap for over a week as a result! That was my last paintball excursion.
Hey mom I'm scared. Mom? MOM?
The only good thing in this is that he got the swimming team pregnant, I can see if he was a masochist but he's not.
